mapper.select: SELECT m.MESSAGE_NO as no, m.MESSAGE_RECEIVER as receiver, m.MESSAGE_TYPE as type, m.WRITE_DATE as writeDate, sender.USER_ID as "sender.id", sender.USER_NICKNAME as "sender.nickname", study.STUDY_NO as "study.study_no", study.STUDY_NAME as "study.study_name", study.P_ADDRESS as "study.p_address" FROM MESSAGE m, USER_INFO sender, STUDY study WHERE study.STUDY_NO = m.STUDY_NO and sender.USER_ID = m.MESSAGE_SENDER and m.MESSAGE_RECEIVER = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGE_SENDER, MESSAGE_RECEIVER, STUDY_NO, MESSAGE_TYPE) VALUES (MESSAGE_SEQ.nextval, #{sender.id}, #{receiver}, #{study.study_no}, #{type})
